About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm by appointment only; closed Saturday and Sundays, also late December and January. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books and journals. Referral to paid researchers is available.

About.Access: 2 weeks' advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity and reasons for research required.

About.Acquisition focus: Dance literature (technical, historic, biographic etc); visual and audio recordings of all forms of dance; designs and drawings of productions created for and by the Australian Ballet School.

About.Major holdings: Various publishers: Ballet magazines 1923- (12m); Dance books 1900-(40m). The Australian Ballet School: Records 1964-(20m). Daryl Lindsay: Original drawings 1937-1940 (5m). Scott Mattewson: Designs and Drawings 1985 (1m). Kate Murray: Costume Designs 1980 (.5m). Graham McKenzie: Set and Costume Designs 1976 (.5m). Kenneth Rowell: Designs 1947-1989 (1m).

About.References: Jill Arkell, Ed., W.H.A.T.. Roseville, Sydney: Campbell Publishing, 1988. Australia Council, OZARTS, Port Melbourne: D W Thorpe, 1989.
